results.title: Cholesterol regulates cannabinoid analgesia through glycine receptors.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ also significantly decreases DH-CBD @DISEASE_Pain_Insensitivity_Congenital @DISEASE_MESH:D000699 @@@analgesia@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059787 @@@acute and chronic pain@@@ of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
